mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tab_service (serviceType, serviceName, serviceContent, serviceCreatorId, serviceCreateTime, serviceStartDate, serviceDuration, serviceMemo, serviceIcon) VALUES (#{type}, #{name}, #{content}, #{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{memo}, #{icon})
mapper.update: UPDATE tab_service SET serviceType = #{type}, serviceName = #{name}, serviceContent = #{content}, serviceStartDate = #{sdate}, serviceDuration = #{edate}, serviceMemo = #{memo}, serviceIcon = #{icon} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.doctorId, CONCAT(a.doctorName, '(', b.hospitalName, ')') as doctorName from tab_doctor a inner join tab_hospital b on b.hospitalId=a.doctorHospitalld
